headline: Entering CIPD
reviewBody: I have been planning to enroll to CIPD program for long time and finally now got the opportunity to start it. Reading alot about this program helped me to do the right decision and i have no doubt that it will fulfil my expectations. I can tell that Avado team supported me in the process. I hope that the coming year will bring valuable knowledge and broaden my professional network

headline: Amazing people
reviewBody: The morning after enquiring about the CIPD Foundation course I received an email from Mona, an Education Consultant, at Avado. Following this we arranged a time to discuss the course over the phone in more detail. Mona was so friendly and explained everything perfectly. We then arranged a call back to get my enrolment started later that evening. I received a call from James who efficiently went through the enrolment and financial side of the course. He then told me that Mona wanted to speak to me prior to me hanging up and passed the call through. This was so Mona could wish me luck and congratulate me. The people here really go the extra mile. Fabulous customer service and genuinely lovely people who are dedicated to helping you. Would recommend to anybody thinking of signing up.

headline: Very helpful.
reviewBody: Very helpful. Spent a lot of time on phone answering all my questions and also rang back when he said he would.

headline: Good product let down but by customer service
reviewBody: Been looking to do this course for a while the initial conversation was informative if I but scripted. Left it was call back a week later if I made my decision earlier drop him a email and he would call be earlier, did this no acknowledgement they had received email not even to say we would discuss it at our arranged time. Process not explained properly and timings not accurate in the applying stage especially as I was clear I had a time frame when he phoned due to work which left me feeling rushed and a bit pressured. However looking forward to course know plenty of people who have done it and enjoyed it, Just shame about foliow up contact

headline: Very helpful!
reviewBody: I just signed up to one of AVADO´s HR certificates, and the enrollment process has been very easy. Also, as soon as I requested information, one of Avado´s advisors called Mona Liaquat contacted me and patiently discussed all my concerns and answered all my questions. I look forward to enjoying the course for the next 11 months

headline: Registration for CIPD online qualification
reviewBody: I requested information on online qualifications and the appropriate level that I should be pursuing my certificate/diploma. I was advised to pursue level 5 certificate whereas I am eligible for level 7. I was told that I need to first clear level 5 in order to pursue level 7, which again ain't correct. Further, I was told that there is no level 7 qualification offered online yet by CIPD which again ain't true. I am highly disappointed and have no motivation to continue with AVADO. I would highly apprecaite if you can at the earliest give a full refund of the first instalment already made by me this week.

headline: Straight forward on line design
reviewBody:
Since enrolling for the 100% on line training course, I have found it straight forward to navigate around the VLC and chat with other students on my course via the forum. It was easy to access reading materials prior to my course start date which has been useful. 
The student support staff and responded to my questions in a timely, friendly and helpful manner.

headline: Such an attentive enrolment service
reviewBody:
The enrolment service offered was second to none. Extremely impressed with the professional yet friendly approach adopted by the person enrolling me. Called when promised despite me asking for several calls back to allow me to check things out and find a lost wallet.  The discussions were meaningful to me and what I wanted out of my learning. I was made to feel like an individual and as such the payment plan and calls were tailored to my needs. 
The person dealing with my enrolment was so attentive, listened and offered advice. Cannot rate her highly enough. Extremely personable!  Overall very impressed with Avado so far and look forward to learning with them.

Highly knowledgeable within this field, I felt that he genuinely wanted to make sure this course was right for me! From initial enquiry to me enrolling Solomon was Patient, kind and courteous! I've since started my course and I am so impressed! Already this has exceeded my expectations! Thank you Solomon and Avado!

reviewBody: After deciding that I wanted to enrol on a cipd course, I contacted this company. From the get go I was so impressed with how lovely and supportive both James and Rhydian were, everything was explained to me in detail, they answered all my questions and nothing was too much trouble. Both James and Rhydian made good on all of the things they said they would do eg, called me back as an when they promised to. As a person who was unsure of which course to take, I recieved lots of helpful advice on which course would be best for my circumstances, additionally I was given advice as to the career opportunities that would be available to me with each course - which was significant in aiding my final decision to enrol on level 5. I am yet to begin the course so at this time I can only speak for my enrolment experiences and it's safe to say that I am very happy. Good customer service is scarce these days so I'm always amazedwhen I find it! Thanks again.

headline: CIPD level 3 in HR Practice - very impressed
reviewBody:
I am very impressed with the material and structure of this course. Our assigned tutor is fantastic and all the support we need is available. I find the course thoroughly enjoyable, challenging and very much worth the money. I'm self funded and had to find a course that could work around my job. This definitely fits the bill. You have to be disciplined but everything you need to complete the course is in the course content or on the CIPD website. You have to become a student CIPD member to complete the course and to access the materials on the CIPD website but it's worth the money. You can also get your student discount card (NUS) as you are a student while studying. This is free and very handy! 
I will be going on to do my CIPD level 5 or 7 after I complete this course in April. Best decision I made choosing this provider.

headline: No problems
reviewBody: I have enrolled to start the Level 3 CIPD courses in Feb 2016 and has no troubles with the enrolment process. I dealt with a lady called Jolene who was very patient with me dilly-dallying around about my decision to enrol. I have started my course yet so I can't give much feedback on that but from what I can see so far, the online learning site seems easy to use.

headline: first online course and half way there
reviewBody:
This is the first time I have studied through a distant learning course and the materials you receive are enough to get you through the course. the live classes are helpful but can turn into a question answer session instead of general guidance.
Technical issues have occurred but seem to be resolved now. Organisation could be better at first we were not receiving enough assessment guidance and tutors seem to want different things from each other instead of all reading off the same page. The course is difficult and time consuming so be under no illusion about that. I work full time and for many weeks have no life at all other than study but will hopefully be worth it.

The enrolment officer was informative, thorough and made me feel relaxed,  not once did I feel rushed or pressured into signing up. Very pleased 4/5

headline: Definitely needs improvement
reviewBody:
I am currently enrolled in the AAT level 2 course and so far it has been a shambles. When I first started, everything was going fine and I had my materials on time (better than most). As the course progressed, it was as if we were forgotten about. Every question asked either doesn't get a reply at all or it can take up to a week! 

When we completed 1 of 2 practice assessments, we were told we could book our exam. I obviously went on to do this under tutor advisement, Only to then find out we were only half way through the unit. We were not told that the exam was on the entire unit. When I went to re-book my exam as I was no where near ready, they told me I had to pay £100! 

When I enrolled onto the course, I was told there would be loads of interactive live classes. When we had these live classes, they were no where near long enough and only questions that were irrelevant were answered. I now cannot remember the last time we had a live class. It must have been at least 5 weeks, there has only been one recorded class.

Then there is the fact that there are an obscene amount  of errors in the textbooks and in the practice questions so there's no real way of knowing if you've got it right. The only way I've managed to pass so far is purely through the AAT website and finding out my own information.

Considering how much money they are happily taking from me for very little in return - I would not recommend this company for the AAT course.

**In all honesty I didn't expect the below reply - I very much appreciate time being taken to write the reply.

headline: Good customer service; polite student relationship officers.
reviewBody: I just enrolled and i am happy with the support i have been given. I  will recommend Avado to my colleagues. Also love course content of level 5 diploma.

headline: Rating AVADO

reviewBody:
The whole experience at Avado from enrolment to getting started with the
course has been smooth so far.The staff and tutor have all been very supportive and helpful creating a positive feel.

headline: Needs improvement in some parts
reviewBody:
I think the Avado learning through home learning college is pretty good. All materials needed to pass the unit are presented to us in detail and there is absolutely no way to fail a unit, however tutor support sessions need to be earlier on in the unit as they're too far in and by the time we have a session, our assignment is already completed or almost completed and then needs changing if the tutor brings something up that we were not aware of. 

I also think the emphasis on helping to find you a job has been highly exaggerated. The website does not have many resources to help me find a job within HR which was one of the main reasons I picked HLC even though it was £900 more than another verified teaching school. 

Not the best, but if you have the money then go for it.

The campus has been easy to navigate; a few minor issues but that's to be expected with technology!  I found the exam booking process to be easy and the format is helpful; rather than a long list of questions, there's only a few that require a detailed answer. I'm looking forward to completing and developing a career in digital marketing.

headline: Brilliant experience
reviewBody: I have had a great experience so far. The enrolment process was super easy and I'm really enjoying my course. Learning online is awesome!

headline: Excellent learning experience.
reviewBody:
I am thoroughly enjoying m
y level 3 programme with AVADO/CIPD.  The technology offers great flexibility for the learner.  I found the virtual learning campus easy to familiarize with and particularly enjoy that the course is delivered in bite size chunks.  This makes it easier to keep on top of the work and fit it around work and personal commitments.  

I am impressed with the quality of the content of the programme and the course is already making a real difference to my practice as a learning and development professional.

I would like to receive more feedback from the tutor in response to my blog entries.  

I would recommend the programme to anyone who is interested in modern learning methods.

headline: Easy, convenient, friendly and a great place to learn!
reviewBody: Avado Learning is fantastic! I'm half-way through my online course and enjoy the learning modules in an atmosphere that's fun, supportive and flexible.

headline: Great course
reviewBody: Undertaking the CIPD level 3 course. This is 100% online so fits in fantastically around work and family commitments. Although no face to face contact the tutor sessions and forums are all you need. The other students also offer great support and we exchange ideas and help all the time. The topics are well set out - first you learn about the topic, then you test yourself and apply the learning to scenarios both fictional and relating to your work place. I would definitely recommend Avado.

headline: Perfect for busy people!
reviewBody:
I work long hours and was concerned about fitting my studies alongside my work. The long distance learning really allows this to work, you can fit your learning around your lifestyle.

My only constructive feedback would be that we have interaction in person. Even if it was every assignment and only desirable to attend it would really help if there was a study or focus group - I think you learn better when talking through ideas with others.

Otherwise I am enjoying myself thoroughly. Tutor and student services are supportive and I am looking forward to my next assignment.

headline: Valuable experience of CIPD online learning
reviewBody:
Online learning is best option for me as I work full time in a busy HR department and i have 2 children under 7 at home. 
Good access to teaching staff and the tutor support team, always on hand to answer questions. 
As it is all online need constant access to IT and knowledge of using IT. Sometimes the system used with Avado and formerly HCL has been problematic and awkward to usr. Nothing major has happened. 

Very busy course that needs time and commitment. There are varied learning methods and the assessments are challenging.

Lisa is a great tutor, very knowledgeable and engaging. Think that the difficulty with distance learning is making a connection between difficulties with home and personal life and work can bring to course commitments and deadlines. 

Would recommend the course (Level 3 HR) but not undertake other studies at the same time.

headline: Outstanding service
reviewBody: The online service is second to none. Well laid out and easy to understand. The tutor support has been invaluable.

headline: Great Way to Learn
reviewBody:
I'm so pleased I chose Avado to do my CIPD qualification. It's simple and easy to use. Each week's learning is clearly set out and it allows you to work through the exercises really easily. I really like how it ticks the box when you have completed an exercise - makes you really motivated to know you're working your way though. 

The best thing for me is that you are in control! You can do your learning when and where it suits you. 

There have been a few technical issues with the progress bar which has been frustrating but it didn't impact on any work I have needed to do.

headline: Well informed
reviewBody: Every advisor I spoke to was very clear in their communication and had the answers to any questions I had. Email communication was also efficient. Thanks so much, excited to start my Level 5 CIPD Certificate!

reviewBody: I'm into my third module and the experience has been very positive. The structure of the modules is very helpful and isn't overloading me with work. Easily manageable with a full-time job.

headline: R MIAH
reviewBody: The  HR course is great I've learned a lot over the past several months about Human Resources and its responsibilities that comes with it. But I wasn't aware of few rules about the assignment  from tutor or student services and for that I've already fail 4 assessments.

headline: Sloppy and bad user experience planning
reviewBody:
The content of the course is thorough. I understand the need for covering breadth over depth but question the value of some of the topic and lack of guidance on how to approach it. 
Tutorials are all about explaining the criteria that we are being asked to fulfil instead of adding value - just get the assignment outline consistent and correct. Really frustrating that it is so open to interpretation that we spend two hours per module with a tutor chewing threw it.
I would value tutorials and videos with practical examples more, and the opportunity to interact with the tutor in a 'classroom' environment online where I can speak rather than typing. This technology exists and is widely used?
I am really frustrated by the resources - again not consistent. The course is online based and requires harvard referencing, yet we get 'extra reading' materials without any links or proper referencing. Some weeks have no references attached but when looking up the subject matter, the notes are directly from the CIPD! 
It feels clunky, the tutor and the markers don't seem to agree on whether tables, headings and bullets are included in word count leading to very unhelpful and misleading instructions. I have submitted my latest assignment with no confidence in my word count.
It is not clear who to contact for what, and no real presence of support. I found out I was pregnant and notified my tutor after the first module. I was told I couldn't have extenuating circumstances until I pushed for a refund, when I was told, it'll be fine, and sent a form - I'd expect more from an 'HR Expert?'
A welcome pack would improve the experience of what, who and when. The navigation is difficult on the website, and there are far too many forums!!! I have no idea where to post, and don't always get a response from a tutor when it is clearly a course related question. Seems they just pick and choose. I have a colleague doing the same course with DPG, and although not directly comparable due to it being partly with face to face time in class, if I knew what I know now, I'd pay the extra £1000 to avoid what feels amateurish.. I picked Avado because of the direct link to CIPD but it gives it a bad name.

headline: Flexible learning
reviewBody: Flexible remote learning with thought put into how peers can effectively support each other and work as teams remotely, strong tutor and admin support. Units cleverly constructed to be engaging. The ability to work at your own pace means it is possible to fit studying round work / life. Avado are responsive to feedback and continually improving the student experience.

headline: Average
reviewBody: A lot of technical hitches on the start of a new module.

headline: Smooth enrollment
reviewBody: When i decided to do my CIPD level three I rung the company and enquired about it, the lady on the phone was very professional, knowledgeable and had a friendly approach to the extent I booked onto the July course there and then, the course it's self has been an experience within its self but my tutor Lisa Stevens has always been on hand when needed, it has been well structured with a few tweaks and adaptations throughout the course but only for the better. My only advise is I wish that the tutor support session was a week before the submission date not 4 days before as this gives us more time to amend and finish our assignments with full of faith instead of the feeling of rushed. Over all experience has been a good one.

headline: Avado
reviewBody: Great way to participate in distance learning

headline: Easy, straightforward process!

I didn't really know what to expect but the quality of service and simplicity of the interface are much better than anything I have experienced. 
Highly reccomend to all looking to further their career with CIPD from home!

headline: Not sure yet prior to review
reviewBody: I think it os good

headline: Being new to online learning I have found Avado helpful, supportive and informative.
reviewBody: I was nervous when I started the course as I hadn't studied for a long time and never online.    However the instructions were clear from the start and it didn't take long to navigate the VLC.  The course content is good and keeps you engaged with videos,  quizzes and forum questions.  The forums are informative as it is good to hear from others in different organisations and jobs.  Tutor support is excellent and I always receive prompt and clear answers to any questions and tutor sessions are well structured and help in preparing for assessments.  Feedback from markers is also very clear and helpful.

headline: Student
reviewBody: The site works well, with no technical issues and good speed. The activities are engaging most of the time.

headline: CIPD  Level 3
reviewBody:
I have chosen this college due to the flexibility it offers to its students as I have a young family and work full time. You can study in your own time and there is no need to attend classes or exams.  Live support sessions give you a chance to talk to your tutor and peers so you do not feel isolated. Student support services are very helpful and answer queries in a timely manner and registering for the course was the easiest thing ever.
The course content is well balanced and compromises of various tools like case studies, quizzes and videos that make it more interesting. Obviously, you need to commit to a few hours of study each week and be quite systematic in order to prepare your assessments, but it's worth it.
I would recommend it to anyone who is looking to fit studies around their busy life.

headline: Recommended
reviewBody: I achieved my level 3 qualification earlier this year using Avado.   I have now moved in to level 5 and have positive feedback for the course so far.

headline: Great support, great website
reviewBody: Tutor and structure are fantastic, sometime small website bugs which are usually fixed quickly. Great turn around times on questions and overall really good support!

headline: excellent
reviewBody: With pleasure, I would recommend this company to anyone.

headline: Great flexibility just needs a few tweaks
reviewBody: I love the fact that everything is online and i can log in at a time to suit my work and other commitments. The access via CIPD for online journals is also excellent and i wouldn't have been able to complete my assignments without it! Some areas do need tweaking, which is understandable as it is a new launch. For example i was under the impression that we would have weekly tutor sessions, we only have 2 per unit which are quite spaced out and occur late in the unit start meaning that it is hard to crack on with the assignments. Improvements have been made to the online sessions whereby limiting peoples ability to ask questions has resulted in a better focus on the session content and has limited the amount of repeat questions!

headline: I believe CIPD and Avado provide brilliant training and are so easy to follow! They make gaining my qualification a possibility
reviewBody: I believe in my honest opinion this is the best route. There is constant access to advice and resources. It is flexible and the staff are amazing i receive answers to problems within hours and all the training is clear and easy to use. Since day 1 I have felt huge support on my journey and would definitely use again.

headline: Fantastic Enrolment Process
reviewBody: The enrolment process was absolutely fantastic. I missed the enrolment date for the previous month by a few hours and the staff worked extremely hard to get me onto it, despite passing the closing time. Extremely polite, friendly and personable staff, very knowledgeable and seems to be a small and friendly team who work very well together. Very easy and no pressure to join - unlike other educational institutions. Would highly recommend.

headline: Excellent services and professionalism -  Avado  Home Learning  College / Alice Beanen
reviewBody:
Alice Beaven has been very helpful to me from day one of thinking about this course. Initially I didn't know how helpful this course would be to me and even where to start but Alice took her time to explain things into details for me, after her explanation and advice I found out this course was the best for me since I already had a fair knowledge of accounting from Ghana. I became much convinced to be enrolled. She then took me through the enrolment  process, she tried to make the whole process easily for me. Her services was very great and I have recommended  Avado Home Learnig College to a friend . After my enrollement I received all the materials needed for my course on the following week and officially started my course on 5th Dec. 2016. To my surprise Alice did not leave me after my enrolment, she always try to know how am getting on with my course and finds out if I needed any further assistance.
My live class also with Sam was fantastic. She tries to take her time to explain to everyone's understanding. 
I recommend AVADO  to everyone
BIG UP 👍 ALICE BEAVEN
BIG UP AVADO

reviewBody: I am very happy with the experience I gave had with Avado. Avado were there every step of the way, they never judged my decisions and just reminded me regularly that they were there when I was happy to start my course.  I am so thrilled to say I will be starting my course January 2017.  Thank you Helen xx

headline: Platform to enhance your HR skills
reviewBody:
Dear All,

I have joined the December L5 batch. The whole experience of enquiring about the course, onboarding and getting started was just flawless.

At every step, I am getting regular updates about the course and the upcoming activities, which is great to keep you engaged.

The first session yesterday was an introductory one, where we got a hang of how exactly the course is planned and what would be our responsibilities in terms of learning/ self study and submissions.

The fact that our tutor is just a mail away is great.. Really looking forward to gain and enhance my HR knowledge with the course and resume my career with a great start. Thanks team

headline: Good
reviewBody:

reviewBody: Andrew brine enrolled me and he was absolutely brilliant, he made me feel really comfortable and as I was spending a lot of money he made me feel like I was doing a good thing, and I felt less anxious. headline: Would highly  recommend
reviewBody: Good quality of distance learning.

headline: Not worth the money!
reviewBody:
I'm studying CIPD Level 5 HR Management.

The website is really poorly designed. It's very confusing to navigate and there are LOTS of broken links. By the way I'm not a technophobe, I'm ex Apple employee, so I get computers and websites.

They advertise the website works on multiple platforms, including iPhone and iPad. But this isn't true. You can login,but the menus don't work, so it's pointless.

The whole website is littered with typos.

During lessons, 90% of the time is taken up with providing tech support to people. From an hour "lesson" you might get a 1 or 2 tips on what to do for your assignment. 

They advertise free CIPD membership with your course, but it only lasts 6 months - course lasts 11 months!

The concept is good, but a lot of work is needed on the system before it's worth the money. Stick to the traditional method of learning for the moment and don't get sucked into the sales pitch!

headline: The best bit about them was the fact there's a 14 day money back guarantee.
reviewBody: The text books were very wordy and just reviewing the topics I'd covered in Level 2 were not written clearly. The online learning 'Campus' seemed to still be in a trial phase and worked sporadically and was awkward to navigate.

headline: Simple and easy

headline: CIPD Home Learning
reviewBody: I have just started the course but I have found it to be enjoyable, flexible and informative. I hope that I will get a lot from it.

headline: Simple,Easy and accessible
reviewBody: This is my first time working with Avado. I am very happy. I find the system easily accessible and informative.

headline: CIPD Level 3
reviewBody: I love the online experience of this course, it gives you free reign to be able to work at your own pace. It also enables you to be able to connect with people who you otherwise wouldn't be able to connect with.

headline: simple, easy and informative!!
reviewBody:
I was very sceptical in regards to doing an online course as I have heard quite a few horro stories, but my experience with Home Learning College aka AVADO was amazing!

They were straight forward, and very easy to get in contact with (unlike other courses who would leave you hanging until you actually called them yourself).

The enrollment process was super easy and I look forward to starting the course.

headline: Good experience dealing with them
reviewBody: I was shown through the process of how the course would work and made aware of all relevant information. The advisor who called me was very knowledgeable and friendly.

headline: Great service
reviewBody:
I have been learning with AVADO for the last 5 weeks, and their service is really good. The staff are really friendly and are very efficient. I was a bit reluctant at first, as many people study with them so wasn't sure how much attention you would get as an online student. But the tutors and student services team are great, they really look after you and reply to emails promptly. 

Their software is good and really easy to use, and it's a great layout for learning. It's an easy pace and you really take it as you want. I'm still yet to see if they offer employment advice, but I'm hoping they will.

I am looking forward to finishing my course, and will hope to keep learning with AVADO.

headline: CIPD 3
reviewBody: I received great advice on what would be the best course option for me. Extremely helpful through out the whole enrollment process considering my company was funding my training and answered all our questions promptly.

headline: Easy to enrol.
reviewBody: I found it very easy to enrol on this course, with helpful advisors who would keep in touch whilst I sorted out the funding for my course. They were also very helpful in splitting the payments for me.

headline: Course enrolement
reviewBody: Very helpful staff, rang back as always when they said would. Very informative and supportive

headline: Excellent, straightforward and easy enrolment
reviewBody:
The enrolment process with Avado was very easy: I first called them to see what do they offer in relation to the CIPD HR course that I wanted to study. 

The customer service person explained it very well to me and answered all my questions and in my opinion also went above his required duty by emailing me all the facts as well. Also they have clearly explained the course price and the payment plan to me.

Once I compared it to other education providers I went back to Avado to confirm a few things and they were again very helpful. The communication with Avado staff was excellent all the time. 

When I made the decision to enrol with them I called back my contact and he was not there, but his colleague took over and made the process so easy. I was assured that Avado is the right education provider for me as everyone I have dealt with during the enrolment process was very knowledgeable, helpful and I got great customer service from them.

I am very happy that I have chosen Avado for my course. I can highly recommend them to other people who are looking to obtain a CIPD approved HR qualification.

headline: Brilliant
reviewBody: Quick, easy and covers everything you need to know.

headline: Really helpful
reviewBody: I hadn't been in education for a while, so I was a little hesitant to enrol on an online course. I spoke to Habiba, the enrolment consultant, and she put me at ease straight away. I've been on the course for a week now and have already been given so much support. Our tutor is a friendly, resourceful and informative person, always encouraging us to come forward with any queries. So far, I am really enjoying the course, it feels great to have a challenge, I definitely feel like a student once more :)

headline: Very great service
reviewBody:
I haven't started my course yet but I can't thank Mona enough.

I bugged her with so many questions and was so undecided but she put me at ease and with all the information it made me choose to go ahead.

Thank you 

Now here's to January and starting

headline: Excellent support!

The live classes were great, unfortunately the times didn't always suit me but as they were recorded I could watch them the next day.
The two course days I attended were well planned out and interesting.
I have really enjoyed the whole experience of learning outside of a college environment and look forat are to the next level.

I was walked through everything and any questions I asked were answered promptly and helpfully. I'd have no problem recommending Avado to anyone wanting to develop their skills.

headline: CIPD level 3
reviewBody:
The information provided at the beginning to ensure I was on the right course was very helpful and refreshingly honest. It was apparent that they were there to ensure you choose the right course rather than the most expensive. 

The website was easy to navigate with plenty of different areas to assist in my studying. Apart from the studying the website had many useful links to help me get a position within HR. 

I felt I had the support of my lecturer throughout who was easy to get in contact through a variety of different methods. If contacted I would normally get a response within 24 hours. Highly recommend the course for anyone looking to learn from home and not after a traditional working environment.

headline: Nice college

I was unsure of doing a course online for a few years but after speaking with a representitive from the college he was able to answer all of my questions and he gave my alot of information over our 2 phone calls.

After signing up I got another call from the study support who gave me abit more info for the course and then it was just waiting for everything to start.

We even got our tutors details for we could either ring or email him either before or during the course.

So far I have no problems with either the enrolement or the course as we are alot of students here to help eachother.

headline: Super friendly and helpful!
reviewBody:
Since I started looking for courses and came across Home Learning College, I have been very impressed by the service of each ember of staff I have spoken to. 
The sales team were great in answering all my questions and making sure I had all the documents and information I needed. 
The student services team have also been great, calling me and answering my questions before I even knew I had them. 
The online platform is nicely laid out. easy to use and engaging. 
I honestly cannot wait to start my course

headline: Vaibhavi Patel
reviewBody: Great experience so far!

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: I wanted to start the course quickly as I had problems with a local college that was taking too long. I certainly got quick! Enrolled on the Wednesday and started the course the following Monday.  Extremely happy with the service so far and would recommend to anyone looking to start a home study course

headline: Good, but could be better
reviewBody:
The online learning has good content and there are weekly tutoring sessions. Assessment feedback is comprehensive and clear. It is also easy to use on mobile phones and tablets which is fantastic and makes it easy to learn wherever you may be.

BUT, there have been a few problems with software for instance not recording completed modules, my first assessment was marked late and there were mistakes in the instruction given to complete work. I had to re-write my entire assessment because instructions on context were not clear and my queries were not answered. The tutoring sessions are on a set time on a Thursday evening which happens to be the one evening I am not home; therefore I have never attended an online session. I feel the qualification is quite expensive and HLC charge a very high interest rate. I applied for a student loan to fund this course but HLC were not a registered learning provider and I was declined. Finally the HLC do not give you text books despite having paid £3000 + Interest for this course, instead everything must be read on a screen apparently 'because content is always changing' rather than to save cost.

headline: Home Learning College
reviewBody:
Solomon made the enrolment process so easy and was very re-assuring and understanding.  To date, everything has been explained well and the Home Learning College have been truly professional and understanding.

Thank you

headline: Very easy and convenient
reviewBody: The course is very easy to complete and manage whilst still being able to continue with employee. Only just started the course however the first online session was very factual and your tutor certainly puts you at ease and answers any questions you have.

headline: Very attentive & prepared
reviewBody:
Home Learning College were very knowledgeable about the course, sent through lots of information and had everything ready for when I'd signed up, so I had everything I needed.
Little too much contact, if I'm honest, pre-sign up, felt there were too many calls/email reminders.
But very friendly and helpful team, and felt very much that someone was on hand if I had any questions, responded very promptly.

headline: Home Learning College
reviewBody: Very good induction, very helpful staff and looking forward to my course now I know what is expected.

headline: Home learning college truly fantastic
reviewBody: I am extremely happy with this company and would happily use them again

headline: Fantastic Support
reviewBody:
I have now completed 2 papers (F1 & F2) and just starting F3 (ACCA).
Very good bunch of tutors to work with, they are quick to respond and will take the time to explain items.
I have found the layout of the course easy to follow, this is also backed up with the hard copy books.
One of the reason I decided to study with AVADO (Previously Home Learning College) was the fact that the price quoted covers EVERYTHING so no nasty surprises.

headline: Very supportive
reviewBody: My experience so far has been very positive. The college provides good support and clear course material.

headline: Helpful and Informative
reviewBody: I had contacted many providers and had many callbacks from them all to discuss enrolment, however HLC stood out as one that helped me decide what I needed not just try to sell me their course. They gave advice as to how the CIPD worked and advised about work commitments etc. Really helpful advice which any of the providers could have given me but Home Learning College were the only ones prepared to spend the time talking to me about these details.

headline: Great learning experience
reviewBody: I've really enjoyed my course. The tutor was excellent and very supportive. The online reading content, tests and exercises and lectures are well done and effective at helping the information stick and getting you used to the exam format. The only negative was that being contacted to book in my exam was really slow.

headline: Simple and easy
reviewBody: I originally enquired about the ACCA diploma course back in June and got a lot of the information then so it was even easier when I registered in August. It took around 15 minutes on the phone to get my details set up and they sent over the email to get registered online straight away. I noticed that my address was wrong after this but after a quick phone call and e-mail and a very helpful staff member this was soon corrected. There is a step by step induction that guides you through the process. The hardest bit was signing up with ACCA themselves as I had some problems with my account but even that was sorted fairly quickly. I noticed that my address was wrong after this but after a quick phone call and e-mail and a very helpful staff member this was soon corrected. All the course materials were sent out within a couple of weeks so I am all ready to get started in a few weeks.

headline: Ease signing up
reviewBody: It was  easy signing up, the person I spoke to was friendly and explained everything clearly.  I enjoy studying with them.

headline: So far, so good
reviewBody: I enrolled on the CIPD Level 3 course and am about to finish the first module. I haven't had any issues with communication, my tutor responds to emails within a day and has been really good with answering questions and giving us advice for assessments.

headline: Level 5 Intermediate CIPD Cert
reviewBody: This feedback is being sought too early as I have not yet submitted my first assignment so am unsure as to how well the course is preparing me

headline: User Friendly and excellent tools
reviewBody: I recently enrolled in Avado and found it very user friendly and useful navigation tools. Will recommend to anyone.

headline: Really great experience
reviewBody:
Having not studied since i was 18 and at college, I was a little worried about getting back into study mode- whether I would be able to keep up and also stay motivated throughout the course. Well, it was a fantastic experience. The online learning campus had everything i needed to support me throughout the course- live classes, recordings if i was still out when they were held, videos, activities, quizzes, areas to chat to other students- and luckily it was really easy to navigate around which was something else I worried about. It has really made a difference to my confidence at work.
I have some colleagues signing up now as well after i recommended AVADO. Hope to return to take the next level.

headline: AVADO Digital - Executive Diploma in Digital Business
reviewBody:
I completed AVADO Digital’s Executive Diploma in Digital Business in July this year – I couldn’t recommend it enough!

Over the 6 month course I built up a tonne of confidence, both in terms of knowledge – knowing what’s going on in the digital space, where to find it, who/what to follow – and in practical skills – SEO, project management techniques and using social media, to name a few.

Having never done a completely online course before I was apprehensive (as it later transpired as were most of my fellow students!), but the course was structured in such a way to really help build a supportive community. In addition, the AVADO Digital Community Support team (in particular, thanks to Beth!) were always at hand - and occasionally welcomingly sympathetic! - when deadlines loomed and I needed a bit of hand holding.

This course was hard work at times, but gave me an awesome grounding in the principles and practices of Digital that I will use to move me through my career. Bravo!
